section.p: The pirates ram you, then pour across the rail brandishing their swords. This promises to be a hard fight.

Roll three dice
if you are a Warrior,
or
two dice
if you belong to any other profession.
Add your Rank to this roll. Then, if your crew is poor quality, subtract 2 from the total. If the crew is good quality, add 2. If the crew is excellent quality, add 3.

outcomes.outcome: Forced to give in; lose 1-6 Stamina
